string.name: hinge_position_coordinates
string.context: Shows the foldable hinge's location with respect to the screen's overall size. e.g.: Top: 0, Bottom: 1920, Left: 540, Right: 540

string.name: hinge_position_size
string.context: Shows the foldable hinge's vertical or horizontal size, depending on the device's orientation. e.g.: Width: 0, Height: 1920

string.name: selected_item
string.context: Shows the selected number from the list in the details screen. e.g.: You selected: 42
